snippet.title: ARCTICO gameplay: Explore the Pole on a Dog Sleigh! (PC early access) | ALPHA SOUP
snippet.description:
Arctico gameplay offers base building, exploration & sleigh rides on a polar island! We play the latest alpha version.
► Enjoy this? Support me on Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/randomiseuser
► Buy me a coffee: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/randomiseuser
► Subscribe here! http://bit.ly/RandomiseUser
► Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/QJkaaeE

More of the best indie games from Randomise User! In this let's play #Artico gameplay review of the alpha version 0.9S, we check out your first half an hour or so of the game, building a polar base, crafting, exploring the icy island to find points of interests, gathering logs, using a giant telescope, creating power, cooking fish, making friends with penguins, using the parachute (and not the glider, oops) and more!

Buy game download on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/325210/Arctico/

Official Arctico gameplay info: "Explore Arctico with your dog sled team, kayak and parachute! Build and customize your base camp, gather resources, take care of your experiments in this peaceful island."

Developed by: Claudio Norori, Antonio Vargas
Version played: alpha 0.9S
Arctico release date: 24 November 2014 (early access); Q4 2020 (full)
Formats available: PC Windows, Mac

Official site: https://www.playarctico.com
More related videos: #RandomiseUser #IndieGames #Arctico

Thanks for watching this let's play Arctico gameplay review of the alpha! More from Randomise User, home of the best indie games:

► Let's play indie games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1fnvqfQI4mhyXJu5Y7hcS5vC
► Alpha Soup early first looks: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1flWq5KRBP8GhUqcGxJT5cPB

Review key received for free to allow us to make this video.

Additional music: "The Ice Giants" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
